Key Match Events: Evin Lewis scored 102 runs off 61 balls
Pathum Nissanka was run out for 56 runs
Avishka Fernando was caught by RL Chase for 34 runs
Charith Asalanka was caught by SE Rutherford for 6 runs
Brandon King was caught by K Mendis for 16 runs
Shai Hope was caught by A Fernando for 22 runs
Post-Match Reflections: Evin Lewis was awarded the Player of the Match award
Charith Asalanka was awarded the Player of the Series award
Miscellaneous Highlights: West Indies won the match by 8 wickets (DLS method)
The match was played at the Pallekele International Cricket Stadium in Kandy
The match was the 3rd ODI of the series between Sri Lanka and West Indies
